description: Amendments to planning permission dated 3 July 2019 (RN: 18/10670/FULL) for Erection of a replacement mansard at fifth floor level with screened plant enclosure above, infill of rear lightwell at 1st to 5th floor level for use as office (Class B1), alterations to existing fourth floor facade along the Cork Street frontage; replacement of windows to match existing, installation of enlarged office reception at ground floor; reinstatement of lightwells at ground floor pavement level and associated works; NAMELY to replace the existing spiral staircases with straight staircases between ground floor and basement levels to improve the quality of the internal circulation between these levels, modify the position of the fifth-floor mansard roof a minimal amount (130mm) towards Cork Street and removal of the middle bay of the approved fenestration, to ensure that the east elevation can be accessed for maintenance purposes as well as to remove clashes with the internal stairs.
